spatial_accuracy.notes: Major structural deviations present. The 3D render adds a central dividing wall that splits the Kitchen/Living area into two separate rooms, which is not in the plan. Door placements are largely hallucinated or missing; the main entrance and bedroom entry are not correctly represented.

structural_fidelity.notes: The stairs are present but located in an open area rather than being properly walled in. A major hallucinated wall divides the main living space. The outdoor balcony/terrace on the left of the floor plan is completely missing.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is generic and does not follow the kitchen layout (no island or counters). Seating is misplaced relative to the plan's sofa and dining table positions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The render is visually clean with consistent lighting and a proper isometric orthographic perspective. Geometry is solid despite being architecturally incorrect.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated central wall dividing the kitchen and living room into two distinct rooms.
Missing outdoor terrace/balcony structure on the left side of the floor plan.
Misplaced door openings; the bedroom entry swing is not captured and the main entrance is moved.
Missing kitchen counters, sink island, and stove units as specified in the 2D plan.
Proportions of the stairwell enclosure are distorted and lack the perimeter walls shown in the plan.
